QuestLocations:
Camp This is a camp, seemingly for refugees. But the fire is very large - and the footprints suggest a populaton too large to subsist on just hunting and gathering alone. 1 -1 0 0 River Category:Land Q_Camp_01 Quest_Camp.png 75 Click_Campfire
Q_Camp_01.png
A Humble Inn This is a house of food and drink, set to appeal to travelers - and their money. 1 -1 0 0 River Category:Land Q_Kingdom_Inn_01 Quest_HumbleInn.png 75 Click_Inn
Q_Kingdom_Inn_01.png
Camp A large group of refugees is gathered here, acompanied by livestock and cargoes of tools and foodstuffs. This is a population of the civilized, only recently set to transit. What are they seeking, or running from? 1 -1 0 0 River Category:Land Q_Camp_01 Quest_Camp.png 75 Click_Campfire
Q_Camp_01.png
An Ancient Graveyard Over the tombstones, too numerous to count, spirits fly freely. Somehow your search for a mount has brought you to this nexus of consciousnesses, living and dead. Do you dare risk seeking your mount here? 1 -1 0 0 River Category:Land G_Graveyard_01 Treasure_LostGraveyard.png 75 Click_Tomb
G_Graveyard_01.png
Camp The people here do not bustle - in fact none can even be standing. Are they indeed still alive? What has happened to the people here? 1 -1 0 0 River Category:Land Q_Camp_01 Quest_Camp.png 75 Click_Campfire
Q_Camp_01.png
